name: AdviceBot
0:
”Alexa ask advice bot to tell me some advice”
”Alexa ask advice bot for random advice”
”Alexa ask advice bot to get advice on a category”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: advice bot
des:
Advice Bot is based on the Advice Slip API. Asking for random advice, advice on a certain category or using an AdviceSlip ID! 
The responses range from humour, to facts. Each response provided is new and interesting!

Any interations with Advice Bot are not intended to be and should not be taken seriously.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
